info.title: Repository Service for TUF API
info.description: Repository Service for TUF Rest API

get.description: Check if the bootstrap of the system is done or not.

post.summary: Post a task to bootstrap the system with initial signed Metadata.
post.description: Submit an asynchronous task to initialize the TUF Repository with initial signed Metadata and Settings. Use the task ID to retrieve the task status in the endpoint /api/v1/task.

put.summary: Put a task to update settings.
put.description: Submit an asynchronous task to update configuration settings. Use the task ID to retrieve the task status in the endpoint /api/v1/task.

post.summary: Post a task to rotate role metadata.
post.description: Submit an asynchronous task to rotate a role metadata that requires offline signing. Use the task ID to retrieve the task status in the endpoint /api/v1/task.

get.summary: Get all metadata roles pending signatures together with their latest trusted versions.
get.description: Get all metadata roles that need more signatures before they can be used and their corresponding latest trusted versions.

post.summary: Post a task to add a signature for a metadata role.
post.description: Submit an asynchronous task to add a signature for a metadata role. Use the task ID to retrieve the task status in the endpoint /api/v1/task.

post.summary: Post a task to delete role metadata in signing process.
post.description: Submit an asynchronous task to delete role metadata in signing process. Check the status and result using the task ID and the `get task state` endpoint.

post.summary: Post a task to add artifacts to Metadata.
post.description: Submit an asynchronous task to add artifacts to Metadata. Use the task ID to retrieve the task status in the endpoint /api/v1/task.

post.summary: Post a task to remove artifacts from Metadata.
post.description: Submit an asynchronous task to remove artifacts from Metadata. Use the task ID to retrieve the task status in the endpoint /api/v1/task.

post.summary: Post a task to publish artifacts.
post.description: Submit an asynchronous task to publish artifacts not yet published from the RSTUF Database. Use the task ID to retrieve the task status in the endpoint /api/v1/task.

add_task_id_to_custom.title: Add Task Id To Custom
add_task_id_to_custom.description: Whether to add the id of the task in custom

publish_targets.title: Publish Targets
publish_targets.description: Whether to publish the targets changes

hashes.title: Hashes
hashes.description: The key(s) must be compatible with the algorithm(s) supported by a TUF client

error.title: Error
error.description: If the task status result is `False` shows an error message

state.description:
The Celery task state. Note: It isn't the task result status.

`PENDING`: Task state is unknown (assumed pending since you know the id).

`RECEIVED`: Task received by a worker (only used in events).

`STARTED`: Task started by a worker.

`RUNNING`: Task is running.

`SUCCESS`: Task succeeded.

`FAILURE`: Task failed.

`ERRORED`: Task errored. RSTUF identified an error while processing the task.

`REVOKED`: Task revoked.

`REJECTED`: Task was rejected (only used in events).
